function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Incremento significativo del teletrabajo a nivel mundial","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transformación en la economía debido a la presencia de la covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mejora de la calidad del aire, reducción de ruido ambiental y contaminación lumínica en la ciudad de medellín","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Alto porcentaje de personas en modalidad de teletrabajo","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Problems with musculoskeletal health due to teleworking conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological problems and stress associated with teleworking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate home workspaces impacting health and productivity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Percepción negativa del teletrabajo","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aislamiento social de los teletrabajadores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of legal framework for telecommuting","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Teleworking may lead to increased sedentary behavior and a lack of physical activity, which can contribute to poor health outcomes and increase the risk of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicts or disputes within the home environment due to teleworking can lead to increased stress and potential negative mental health outcomes, impacting the individual’s immune system and overall health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced air quality improvements could result from increased teleworking, if individuals do not take measures to maintain a healthy indoor environment, leading to potential health risks, including the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Telecommuting may lead to decreased physical activity and sedentary behavior.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Telecommuting may negatively impact mental health and sleep patterns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher dependence on technology and digital skills for telecommuting.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promotion of telecommuting as a result of perceived benefits for women may lead to increased spread of contagious diseases due to reduced physical distancing and increased indoor contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mayor contacto frecuente entre miembros de la familia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preservación de la calidad del aire al evitar desplazamientos al lugar de trabajo","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exigencia de mayor conocimiento computacional para el teletrabajo","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences between genders in perception of telecommuting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of telecommuting on the
